entry.title: More Countries Find Omicron Variant
entry.content: Australia and Austria joined the group of countries that have detected cases of the new Covid-19 variant, which is presenting policy makers with choices that are politically and socially difficult.

entry.title: Taliban Covert Operatives Seized Kabul, Other Afghan Cities From Within
entry.content: Undercover agents—often clean-shaven, dressed in jeans and sporting sunglasses—spent years infiltrating Afghan government ministries, universities, businesses and aid organizations.
